long_description: These 78-inch Load Bars are one component of a Thule car top rack system. Bars span vehicle's roof providing the point of attachment for gear mounts and accessories. Load bars are available in 4 lengths; refer to Thule's Fit Guide for the minimum length recommended for a specific vehicle. Bar dimensions are 78 x 1.3 x 0.96 inches.
short_description: These 78-inch Load Bars are one component of a Thule car top rack system.
